stages.logText: Facutloni asked me to help him deliver all of the items ordered by his customers a long time ago. He even gave me an old document with the names and items written on it.
I delivered 'Dusty Old book' to Arcir the book-lover from Fallhaven.
I delivered 'Striped Hammer' to Edrin the metalsmith from Fallhaven.
I delivered 'Pretty Porcelain Figure' to Odirath the armorer from Stoutford.
I delivered 'Old, worn cape' to Venanra the laundress from Brimhaven.
I delivered 'Mysterious green something' to Tjure the unluckiest merchant from BWM.
I delivered 'Chandelier' to Rob's servant the servant from Guynmart.
I delivered 'Yellow boot' to Arghes the merchant from Remgard.
I delivered 'Lyre' to Wyre the mournful woman from Vilegard.
I delivered 'Plush Pillow' to Mikhail your father from Crossglen.
I delivered Crystal Globe to Pangitain the fortune teller from Brimhaven.
I returned to Facutloni and told him that I delivered all of the ordered items.
I gave Facutloni the Docket. He is very glad.
